channel.title: 🏢 UMass Amherst University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 UMass Amherst University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Combining Observational Data and Language for Species Range Estimation
item.description: LE-SINR combines Wikipedia species descriptions with citizen science observations to create accurate species range maps, even with limited data, outperforming existing methods.
